description.displayText: Having Halina in our home to care for my mom was such a wonderful experience. Her companionship and patience is delightful and mixed with her helpfulness in anything we needed helped ease the stress of caring for my mom. She would help me with some household items and also prepared several meals which were all fantastic. Always on time with no distractions or issues at all during her time with us. Lastly we only wished she could have moved with us when we relocated out of state. I high recommend her services.
